items.name: Axe of Valor
items.description: This axe is said to have been forged at the beginning of time, by the very gods themseleves. For this reason, it's power is unmatched by all.

attributes.pickup_message: A sense of warmth and valor flows through your bones when you pick this up.
success_action_phrases: The axe swings in a graceful motion, cutting into its foe with grace and elegance.
With beauty, the axe lightly swings into the foe.
failure_action_phrases: Uh-oh. The axe, in all its might and valor, fails to hit the enemy.

items.name: Sword of Stealth
items.description: Crafted by the shadows themselves, this weapon is silent but deadly.

attributes.pickup_message: The handle feels cold, like the feeling of darkness itself. You shudder.
success_action_phrases: With a cold, slick motion, the blade cuts into the enemy with a serene sharpness.
The black blade vanishes into the enemy before quickly being drawn out in a moment of tension.
failure_action_phrases: The blade just misses the target.
